data.fullContent: The mayor gathered the residents to let them know that the town council had collected enough money to build a new community park. Many of the town residents were excited, and they couldn't wait for the new park to be built. However, some people thought the old park didn't need to be replaced. The old park was small, so the mayor was determined to build the new park. The mayor announced that the new park would be built at the edge of town with a large parking lot, since there had been issues with visitors finding parking spaces in the old park. The new park would be larger than the existing one, with walking paths and sports fields. It would also be built on a hill to provide beautiful views of the surrounding area.

q1.translation: 市长把居民召集起来，让他们知道市议会已经筹集了足够的钱来建造一个新的社区公园。镇上的许多居民都很兴奋，他们迫不及待地等待新公园的建成。然而，一些人认为旧公园不需要被取代。老公园很小，所以市长决定建一个新公园。市长宣布，新公园将建在城市的边缘，并有一个大停车场，因为游客在旧公园找到停车位一直存在问题。

The old park was small, so the mayor was determined to build the new park. The mayor announced that the new park would be built at the edge of town with a large parking lot, since there had been issues with visitors finding parking spaces in the old park.
